title: NGSS Performance Expectations
text: NGSS PEs describe what students should know and be able to do. They integrate practices, crosscutting concepts, and disciplinary core ideas.

title: RAG overview
text: Retrieval-Augmented Generation combines a retriever with a generator to ground responses in external documents.

title: Hybrid Retrieval
text: Hybrid retrieval blends sparse (BM25) and dense embeddings to improve recall across query types.

title: LangGraph basics
text: LangGraph expresses LLM systems as stateful graphs with nodes, edges, and control flow for loops and branches.

title: Citations and Faithfulness
text: Answer faithfulness measures whether claims are supported by sources. Inline citations reduce hallucination risk.
